details.description:
The Residences at 1127 Flatbush Avenue sit conveniently at the intersection of two of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods?Prospect Lefferts Gardens and Ditmas Park. If luxury is what you seek, then life at 1127 Flatbush is one you can afford.
Designed with its residents in mind, 1127 Flatbush offers 360 degree rooftop views of Brooklyn, Manhattan and Queens, which are only an elevator ride away from your green communal courtyard, laundry room, on-site storage lockers, and fully secure bike room.
Each apartment?s layout is a thoughtfully considered balance of space and light. Studio, one, and two bedrooms are all apportioned with in-unit climate control, dishwashers, and stainless steel appliances. Many units also provide private outdoor space overlooking the bustling neighborhood below.
Lifestyle 1127 Flatbush provides an authentic Brooklyn experience, sitting at a cultural crossroads representative of its borough. A short distance from Brooklyn?s Prospect Park, the King?s Theater and Ditmas Park?s restaurant, shopping and nightlife-fueled Cortelyou Road, residents at 1127 Flatbush will enjoy not having to go far from home to experience the best of Brooklyn.
2 Bed plus office no smoking, no loud music, no pets landlord lives downstairs

Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. details.description:
----- Luxury STUDIO, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

details.description:
Welcome to 119 Albany Ave, a beautifully renovated one-bedroom apartment located in the highly sought-after neighborhood of Crown Heights North. This meticulously updated unit offers modern and stylish finishes, creating a contemporary living space for your comfort and enjoyment.
Step inside to discover a thoughtfully designed interior that showcases a seamless blend of classic and contemporary elements. The apartment boasts updated stainless steel appliances, adding a touch of elegance and functionality to the well-appointed kitchen. The hardwood floors throughout the unit enhance the overall aesthetic appeal and provide a warm ambiance.
The queen-sized bedroom offers a peaceful retreat with ample space for relaxation and rest. The central air conditioning ensures optimal comfort during all seasons, allowing you to create the perfect indoor environment. Additionally, the apartment features the timeless charm of exposed brick walls, adding character and a unique touch to the living space.
Convenience is at your fingertips with laundry facilities conveniently located within the building, saving you time and effort. Furthermore, this pet-friendly apartment welcomes your furry companions, making it a great option for pet owners.
The prime location of 119 Albany Ave provides easy access to transportation options, including the nearby subway stations, allowing for a hassle-free commute to other parts of Brooklyn and beyond. Additionally, the neighborhood is dotted with an array of excellent eateries, offering a diverse range of culinary delights to explore.
One of the most enticing aspects of this apartment is that there is no broker fee, ensuring a straightforward rental process. Guarantors are also welcome, providing flexibility for those who may require additional support during the application process. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make 119 Albany Ave your new home. Available starting July 1st, this beautifully renovated one-bedroom apartment offers modern comforts, convenient amenities, and a fantastic location in vibrant Crown Heights North.

The open-plan living and dining area is spacious and airy, with plenty of room for entertaining and relaxation. The kitchen has modern appliances, including a gas stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher, and features plenty of counter and cabinet space.
The bedroom is generously sized, with ample space for a queen-sized bed and other furniture. The bathroom has been recently updated with new fixtures and finishes, including a modern vanity and a shower/tub combo.
The building has a live-in superintendent and offers amenities such as a laundry room and a bike storage area. It is conveniently located near several subway lines, including the 2, 3, 4, and 5 trains, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. There are also many restaurants, bars, and shops in the area, making it a great neighborhood for those who love to explore.

No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. Welcome to 868 New York Ave, Unit #2, located in the vibrant borough of Brooklyn, New York. This stunning, brand new building offers a massive 3-bedroom duplex apartment with PRIVATE BACKYARD!
Upon entering, you'll be greeted by elevator access, ensuring convenience and ease as you move through the building. Additionally, residents have the privilege of enjoying rooftop access, providing breathtaking views of the surrounding cityscape.
For added convenience, a laundry room is available within the building, making it effortless to stay on top of your laundry needs. The apartment itself boasts gorgeous, brand new finishes, creating a modern and stylish living environment.
One of the standout features of this unit is its abundance of natural light, flooding the space and creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Whether you're relaxing in the living area or preparing a meal in the spacious kitchen, you'll be bathed in sunlight throughout the day.
For those with furry friends, this building is pet-friendly, allowing you to bring your beloved pets along to enjoy your new home. Additionally, guarantors are welcome, providing flexibility for those who may require additional support during the application process.
If you're looking for a spacious, contemporary, and pet-friendly living space in Brooklyn, look no further than 868 New York Ave. With its remarkable features, including elevator and rooftop access, laundry facilities, and stunning finishes, this duplex apartment offers a truly exceptional living experience.

Welcome to 1496 Bushwick! This spacious and modern 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment offers a comfortable and stylish living space in the vibrant neighborhood of Bushwick. Situated in a well-maintained building, this unit provides an ideal blend of convenience and contemporary living.
Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Bushwick, this apartment places you in the heart of one of Brooklyn's most dynamic areas. Bushwick is renowned for its artistic flair, eclectic dining options, and lively nightlife scene. Explore the neighborhood's trendy cafes, art galleries, and unique boutiques that line the streets. Enjoy the nearby green spaces, such as Maria Hernandez Park, perfect for leisurely strolls or picnics.
Commuting is a breeze with multiple subway stations and bus routes in close proximity, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. Additionally, the area offers a range of amenities, including supermarkets, pharmacies, and fitness centers, ensuring all your daily needs are met conveniently.
Don't miss the opportunity to call 1496 Bushwick, your new home. Schedule a viewing today and experience the best of Bushwick living in this modern and inviting 2-bedroom apartment!

details.description:
Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.
